actions.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Environment and Public Works. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Symms. Without written report.
Referred to Senate Committee on Budget.
Committee on Budget. Reported to Senate by Senator Domenici favorably without amendment. With written report No. 97-251.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Regular Orders. Calendar No. 345.
Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: An original resolution to waive section 402(a) of the Congressional Budget Act with respect to the consideration of S.1024, the Federal-Aid Highway Improvement Act of 1981.

summary.text: Waives certain requirements of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to the consideration of S.1024 (highway funding).

titles.title: An original resolution to waive section 402(a) of the Congressional Budget Act with respect to the consideration of S.1024, the Federal-Aid Highway Improvement Act of 1981.
